lessons.title: Welcome to Web Development
lessons.content:
# Welcome to Web Development

In this course, you'll learn the fundamentals of building websites.

## What You'll Learn

- HTML for structure
- CSS for styling
- JavaScript for interactivity

## Course Structure

This course is divided into 3 main sections:

1. HTML Basics
2. CSS Fundamentals
3. JavaScript Introduction

Let's get started!

lessons.title: HTML Basics Quiz
lessons.description: Test your knowledge of HTML basics
lessons.instructions: Read each question carefully before answering.

questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language. It's the standard markup language for creating web pages.

questions.question: HTML tags are case-sensitive
questions.explanation: HTML tags are not case-sensitive. Both <div> and <DIV> work the same way, though lowercase is recommended.

questions.question: Which of these are valid HTML5 semantic elements?
questions.explanation: header, section, and article are valid HTML5 semantic elements. There is no <content> element.

questions.question: The HTML element used to define the title of a document is ___
questions.explanation: The <title> element defines the title shown in the browser tab or window title bar.

questions.question: Order these HTML elements from outermost to innermost in a typical document structure:
questions.explanation: The correct nesting is: html > body > div > p

questions.question: Match the HTML tag with its purpose:
questions.explanation: Each tag serves a specific semantic purpose in HTML documents.
